title: A1502 820-3476-A no power
message:
Hi,
I have an A1502 820-3476-A that has no power, no green light, no fan spin, and consumes aroun 0.2A on bench PSU.

It seams that PPDCIN_G3H_CHGR is shorted, and I already replaced DC adapter:

Diode reading is 0.002 and 0.1 ohm to ground.

I've injected 1.5V, but nothing gets hot. Is it safe to inject higher voltage?
